::Zardus/The Oblitercons::

Zardus flies over the forest, scanning it for anything peculiar. He wondered 
what Panzertron had wanted to talk to him about. He narrows his eyes, his 
scanners reporting a Maximal signature.

Zardus growls. It was one of the signatures of the bots that the Alliance had 
taken hostage earlier...

"Dark One, are you and your team busy right now?" he says into his comm-link, 
tracking the signature.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Oblitertron stops a few miles away from the Cybertronian Fire, watching the 
Maximals get away. They were lucky this time, next time they'd all die....

The gestalt group seperates again, Dark One recieving Zardus' transmission.

"No," he replies, "The Maximals got away, this time."

"Allright," sounds Zardus; voice, "There are a pair of Maximals in Grid 36," 
(OOC: I forgot the coordinates they were in, so I'm guessing), "One of them 
is one of the past hostages, the other one is another Maximal."

Dark One growls. He still remembered crawling to the CR chambers after the 
Maximal rescue mission...

"Let's go," he says to his team, "We've got Maximals to kill."

With that, he flies off toward Dinobot's and Tavatron's position, the rest of 
the Oblitercons following on the ground.
